title: Head-to-Head Mock Draft Episode! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/28
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy and Jason battle it out in a mock draft! Hear the thought process behind their picks, and find out what happens when they draft with just one spot between them! Plus, the latest NFL News, and a quick question about drafting players just to trade them. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 28th, 2022

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(04:20) - Quick Question
(08:15) - NFL News
(17:40) - Mock Draft
Full Draft Board
